extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
The legendary city of Orazca has been found, but it will not be claimed without a fight. Now, you must outpace, outwit, and overpower your rivals as you vie for control of this ancient metropolis. Succeed, and you will wield the greatest power of the plane.

Contents:
• 36 packs per booster display
• 15 randomly inserted cards per booster pack

• 15 randomly inserted cards per booster pack

results.cleanName: Rivals of Ixalan Planeswalker Deck Angrath

Planeswalker Deck featuring "Angrath, Minotaur Pirate". This deck contains the following:

• 1 Magic learn-to-play guide

results.cleanName: Rivals of Ixalan Planeswalker Deck Set of 2

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Collect both Planeswalker decks that feature "Vraska, Scheming Gorgon" and "Angrath, Minotaur Pirate".

Each deck contains the following:

• 1 Ready-to-play 60-card deck, featuring a foil premium Planeswalker card
• 2 Rivals of Ixalan booster packs
• 1 Strategy insert
• 1 Magic learn-to-play guide

results.name: Rivals of Ixalan - Planeswalker Deck [Set of 2]

extendedData.name: OracleText
extendedData.value:
Contents:


• 10 Rivals of Ixalan booster packs
• 1 card box
• 1 player's guide
• 1 80-card land pack
• 1 learn-to-play insert
• 1 Spindown? life counter
• 1 Menu booklet

extendedData.name: OracleText
